questions.question: Is the red headband visible on the mother’s head, positioned across her forehead?

questions.question: Is there a greenish-gold fabric draped over the mother’s lap?

questions.question: Do both the mother and child have curly dark hair?

questions.question: Is the lighting coming from the upper left, casting soft shadows on the right side of the figures?

questions.question: Are the folds and drapery of the white dress and blue dress clearly visible and realistically rendered?
questions.explanation: The folds and drapery in Image B are clear and realistic, shown through detailed rendering which captures the texture and movement of fabric.
